# 有道精品课

## 50

1. DEIBC  
   - \(\Delta ADU \sim \Delta ABD\)  
   - \(\frac{AN}{AM} = \frac{AD}{AB} = \frac{DN}{BM}\)  
   - \(\Delta AUE \sim \Delta ANC\)  
   - \(\frac{AN}{AM} = \frac{AE}{AC} = \frac{UE}{MC}\)  

2. \(AN = 2UM\)  
   - \(\frac{AN}{AN} = \frac{2}{3}\)  
   故两组相似的相似比例为 \(\frac{2}{3}\)  

3. \(\frac{S_{ADW}}{S_{ABM}} = \left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^2 = \frac{4}{9}\)  
   \(\frac{S_{ADUE}}{S_{AMC}} = \left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^2 = \frac{4^2}{9^2}\)  

4. \(S_{ADW} = 4k\)  
   \(S_{ABM} = 9k\)  
   \(S_{ADUE} = 4k\)  
   \(S_{AMC} = 9k\)  

5. \(S_{ABC} = S_{ABM} + S_{AMC} = 9k + 9k = 18k\)  

6. \(S_{ADW} = \frac{1}{2} S_{ADW}\) (等高不等底)  
   \(S_{ADUE} = \frac{1}{2} S_{ADUE}\) (同底)  

7. \(S_{ADW} = 2k\)  
   \(S_{AMUE} = 2t\)  

8. \(S_{ADUE} = S_{ADW} + S_{AMUE} = 2k + 2t\)  
   \(S_{ADME} = \frac{2k + 2t}{9k + 9t} = \frac{2(k + t)}{9(k + t)} = \frac{2}{9}\)
